<title level="1" pfs="">[Drow Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1385)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Wardens watch over drow encampments and often work in small groups.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Drow_DrowWarden.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Drow Warden](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1385)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Drow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=51" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**

**Items**
[Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9), [Elven Curve Blade](/Weapons.aspx?ID=50), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic, +2 status to all saves vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)
</row>

**HP** 60

**Immunities**
[sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

[**Attack of Opportunity**](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3) <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
elven curve blade +14 ([Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 slashing plus hampering slash

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +13 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus lethargy poison

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 19
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (at will)

**Hampering Slash**   A target damaged by the warden's melee Strike must succeed at a DC 21 Fortitude save or be [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) until the end of the warden's next turn.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   A warden deals an extra 1d6 damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
